description: The subject aims to provide students the capability to engage an independent study on the assigned research topic. It will facilitate students to enforce their knowledge of the topic, and therefore to have creative thinking of the topic.

syllabus.zh:
Students need to complete the following tasks of the course, including
1. working with course advisor to form the research topic, or on the assigned topic by advisor,
2. engaging a comprehensive literature survey of the topic,
3. structuring the report for the research topic, and
4. writing a report of the intendent study.
